item.title: The Wrong Place
item.description: Intro Welcome to Ethan’s awful website that is long overdue. You are most definitely in the wrong place. Summaries Here, I write summaries for school subjects, with the aim of making revision a lot easier.

item.title: Year 12 Methods
item.description: blue { color: lightblue; } red { color: red; } Why am I doing this? Please see the Mascochism Tango by Tom Lehrer for further information.
